food.name: Masala Dosa
food.details: Crispy rice and lentil crepe stuffed with spiced potato filling, served with sambar and coconut chutney

food.name: Chole Bhature
food.details: Spicy chickpea curry served with deep-fried bread made from maida flour

food.name: Pani Puri
food.details: Crispy, hollow puri shells filled with tangy tamarind water, potato, and chickpeas

food.name: Aloo Gobi
food.details: Spiced cauliflower and potato curry cooked with turmeric, cumin, and coriander
